QColor color

Detailed Description

Combo box to choose a color. The combo box show you the color and an associate text to the color. The showed color, is standard Qt color. The user can also change, and use a custom color. In this case a dialog is open to allow the user to make his choice.

This component is originally written for KDE3. He was adapt to turn on Qt4.
